snippet: Defending Australian Open champion Kim Clijsters suffered a hip flexor injury at the Brisbane International tournament.
abstract: Defending Australian Open champion Kim Clijsters suffered a hip flexor injury at the Brisbane International tournament.
lead_paragraph: Defending Australian Open champion Kim Clijsters took a significant hit in her bid to defend her title at Melbourne Park later this month after she was forced to retire from her semifinal match at the Brisbane International after suffering a left hip flexor injury.

headline.main: Clijsters May Be Out of Australian Open After Injury in Brisbane
